p: From January 20, 2020 to February 20, 2020, 297 consecutive patients who had been confirmed with COVID-19 and admitted to Guangzhou Eighth Peopleâ€™s Hospital were included in this study. The median age was 48 years, and 154 (51.9 %) were female. 245 (82.5 %) patients were diagnosed with mild/moderate cases, 52 (17.5 %) severe/critical cases. The baseline characteristics are shown in Table 1 .
